title: 89 Canlis Family-Meal Delivery & Community Agriculture Boxes | Coronavirus Restaurant Impact
description: Since the Coronavirus restaurant closures, Seattle-based restaurant Canlis was forced to rapidly change operations from fine dining to now offering unique tactics such as “family-meal delivery” and “Community Supported Agriculture Box”. They are also having bottle service, opening up their cellar for pick up at the restaurant or as an add-on to Family Meal delivery.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
